body:
Hey everyone,

So lately i dont like the map rot in destroy. Its a lot of DTC and i dont know if im the only one, but i dont like it. I rather have old maps like Quintis, Senex 1, Rendezvous and other throwback maps. I dont know if ppl agree with me but i would like to know. Also, the ppl who are voting DTC for next tourney are crazy.

Can ppl respond and give their opinion.

Mels159

(im tempbanned for 3 days)
